00031 // Super class for different projections for drawing
00032 class DrawingProjection {
00033 
00034   public:
00035    
00036    enum projection_t {
00037       cosLatProjection = 0,
00038       braunProjection = 1,
00039       mercatorProjection = 2,
00040 
00041       nbrProjections
00042    };
00043 
00044    // Constructor
00045    DrawingProjection( DrawingProjection::projection_t type,
00046                       const MC2Point& size );
00047 
00048    //DrawingProjection() { m_projectionType = nbrProjections; }
00049 
00050    // Destructor
00051    virtual ~DrawingProjection() {}
00052 
00053    // Inits the class
00054    virtual void init() = 0;
00055 
00056    // Saves the data to a packet   
00057    virtual void save( Packet* p, int& pos ) const = 0;
00058 
00059    // Reads the data from a packet and creates the object
00060    static DrawingProjection* create( const Packet* p, int& pos );
00061    
00062    // Converts a MC2-coordinate to a point
00063    virtual MC2Point getPoint( const MC2Coordinate& coord ) const = 0;
00064 
00065    // Converts a global MC2-coordinate to a point
00066    virtual MC2Point getGlobalPoint( const MC2Coordinate& coord ) const = 0;
00067 
00068    // Gets the pixelbox where the projection is valid
00069    const PixelBox& getPixelBox() const {
00070       return m_pixelBox;
00071    }
00072 
00073    // Converts a MC2-coordinate to a POINT
00074    POINT getPointFromCoordinate( const MC2Coordinate& coord ) const;
00075    
00076    // Converts a point to a MC2-coordinate
00077    virtual MC2Coordinate getCoordinate( const MC2Point& point ) const = 0;
00078 
00079    // Converts a global point to a MC2-coordinate
00080    virtual MC2Coordinate
00081           getGlobalCoordinate( const MC2Point& point ) const = 0;
00082    
00083    // Converts a POINT to a MC2-coordinate
00084    MC2Coordinate getCoordinateFromPoint( const POINT& point ) const;
00085    
00086    virtual int32 getLatDiff( int32 y ) const = 0;
00087    
00088    virtual int32 getLonDiff( int32 x ) const = 0;
00089 
00090    // Returns the projection type
00091    DrawingProjection::projection_t getProjectionType() const;
00092 
00093    // Returns the size of the data in bytes
00094    virtual uint32 getSizeInPacket() const = 0;
00095 
00096    // Returns the bounding box
00097    virtual const MC2BoundingBox& getBoundingBox() const = 0;
00098 
00099    virtual const MC2BoundingBox& getLargerBoundingBox() const = 0;
00100 
00101    // Returns the scale level
00102    virtual uint32 getScaleLevel() const = 0;
00103 
00104    // Returns the status
00105    virtual StringTableUTF8::stringCode getStatus() const;
00106 
00107    // The status
00108    StringTableUTF8::stringCode m_status;
00109 
00110    bool isJ2meZoom( int zoom ) const {
00111       return m_j2me_zooms.find( zoom ) != m_j2me_zooms.end();
00112    }
00113    
00114   private:
00115    // Pixelbox
00116    PixelBox m_pixelBox;
00117    // The projection type
00118    DrawingProjection::projection_t m_projectionType;
00119 protected:
00120    // Zoom levels for j2me-client
00121    set<uint32> m_j2me_zooms;
00122 };

00211                           int nbrPixels,
00212                           DrawingProjection::projection_t type );
00213 
00214    // Destructor
00215    ~CylindricalProjection() { }
00216 
00217    // Returns the number of zoom levels
00218    int getNbrZoomlevels() const;
00219    
00220    //  Returns the matrix with the nbr of squares for each zoom level
00221    vector< pair<int, int> > getSquareSizes() const;
00222 
00223    // Returns the bounding box
00224    const MC2BoundingBox& getBoundingBox() const;
00225 
00226    const MC2BoundingBox& getLargerBoundingBox() const;

00232 
00233   protected:
00234 
00235    // Create the square
00236    void createSquare();
00237    
00238    // Create the bounding box
00239    void createBoundingBox();
00240 
00241    // Matrix with sizes for the squares
00242    vector< pair<int, int> > m_squareSizes;
00243    
00244    // nbr of squares in latitude
00245    int m_latSquares;
00246 
00247    // nbr of squares in longitude
00248    int m_lonSquares;
00249 
00250    // The x coordinate for the requested square
00251    int m_xPixel;
00252 
00253    // The y coordinate for the requested square
00254    int m_yPixel;
00255 
00256    // The zoom level
00257    int m_zoomLevel;
00258 
00259    // The nbr of pixels for the picture
00260    int m_nbrPixels;
00261 
00262    // The radius
00263    double m_radius;
00264 
00265    // The bounding box
00266    MC2BoundingBox m_bbox;
00267 
00268    MC2BoundingBox m_largerBBox;
00269 };
